title: GROUP BY Clause
subject: Database Management Systems
theory:
Groups rows that have the same values into summary rows. 
Used with Aggregate functions to get summary PER group.
syntax: SELECT Dept, SUM(Salary) FROM Emp GROUP BY Dept;

examples.code:
Dept | Salary
IT   | 100
IT   | 200
HR   | 150
-> IT: 300, HR: 150
examples.explanation: Calculates sum for each unique Dept.

common_mistakes.correction: If you Select a Column and an Aggregate, that Column MUST be in Group By.

summary: From raw data to categorized reports.
